attributes.action: make cyclist have to follow the same criteria as any other road using vehicles
attributes.additional_details:
jumping red lights, forcing there way through traffic on narrow roads.no lights,  generally abusing drivers for there lack of understanding the rules of the road, failing to use a cycle lane when one is available .
as more join the road network this is only going to get worse to prevent a fatality action is needed now before the issue becomes too big to handle
attributes.background: cyclist need to understand the highway code, and be made traceable for there actions .insurance, no plate, licence and bike safety test.
